## 练习 4.24

```{r}
x = rnorm(100)
x_bar = mean(x)
x_0.5 = quantile(x, 0.5)
# k = log2(100)
# k
# g = seq(-5, 5, k)
hist(x, freq = F, main = "", xlab = "x", ylab = "频率/组距", family = "Kai")
boxplot(x, range = 1, ylab = "x")
```
